name: Beol VS Pyramid Man BOSS FIGHT
name_original: Beol VS Pyramid Man BOSS FIGHT
description:
You play as Beol, A "normal" cat that is friends with Leo. But one day when he was reading a newspaper, he found out that a guy that goes by Pyramid Man was going to set off a nuclear bomb and destroy Earth! Beol decides to set off and save the world! Alot of people doubted him, but he makes it to one of his computer labs and they have an ePiC fight. The computer lab was blown up, and Beol actually did it! He saves the world! (From here it isn't canon.) But unfortunately for him, he finds a mysterious apple in his front door 2 days later, he decides to eat it but it had a sleeping pill in it, and he's in a dream where he's pretty small and Pyramid Man returns! And there is boxes falling from the sky small enough for you to throw at him! He will not awake from his slumber until he defeats Pyramid Man! 

(Beol, Leo and Pyramid Man are all made by @Leo Gato Chino Wero Games)

This was made for Leo's birthday.
